box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 24px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;
div.font: 登录：我的用户名 Tom，密码 123456

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 145px; margin-left: 758px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 24px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;
div.font:
2. 数据库有Tom这个用户，计算用户 secrect,
SHA256(12345+1ck12b) 等于数据库中的
passwd 字段值 ，则校验通过

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 260px; margin-left: 516px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 24px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 280px; margin-left: 768px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 24px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;
div.font: 3.服务端使用密钥(服务端存储)创建 JWT

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 310px; margin-left: 516px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 24px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 24px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;
div.font:
4. 你登录成功了，响应报文有
Set-Cookie 字段，下次请求带上

div.font:
7. JWT 校验通过，从payload 获取用户name，
数据库查询对应用户的购物清单
